title: Client stuck at 0% scanning release manifest
body:
Trying to update the game and it just never makes progress.

I have tried running as admin

changing the p2p=true

turned of windows fire wall and anti virus

I've run the hextec repair tool. 

tried running the lol.launcher.admin with admin privleges.


Really frustrating to just not be able to play because the patcher sucks. not sure what else I can do feel like I have tried everything people have suggested on the boards. 

i have the logs from the HTR tool but not sure how to attach them with this post.

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Hmmmm sounds like something on your pc is blocking the patcher from scanning any files, which is typically fixed by granting the correct permissions. Run through every step in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to cover your bases, but if that doesn't help go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can look over your logs to see what's going wrong.
